DOC.brief_summary: This study explore effect dexmedetomidine postoperative cognitive dysfunction one-lung ventilation elder patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Dexmedetomidine Postoperative Cognitive Dysfunction During One-lung Ventilation Elder Patients
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent . Ongoing onelung ventilation surgery . American Society Anesthesiologists class I III . Aged 55 75 year old . Body Mass Index 18 25 kg/m2 . Systolic blood pressure 180 mmHg low 90 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure 110 mmHg low 60 mmHg . Serious heart , liver , kidney , pulmonary , endocrine disease serious infection . Suspected confirm difficult airway . History abnormal anesthesia . Suspected malignant hyperthermia . Use sedative antidepressant drug serious alcoholism Minimental State Examination less 17 . Highest academic degree grade 6 primary school Patients inability exchange serious visual hearing impairment mental disability . History shock . Carotid artery stenosis central nervous system disease stroke , epilepsy . Allergic investigational product contraindication . Participated study within 30 day .
